meanings.definition: Of or relating to an epitaph.
meanings.sent1: The epitaphian words on the tombstone honored his memory.
meanings.sent2: The epitaphian inscription on the grave marker was touching.
meanings.sent3: The epitaphian tribute brought a smile to those who read it.
meanings.sent4: Her epitaphian farewell echoed through the cemetery.
meanings.sent5: The epitaphian message captured the essence of his life.

meanings.definition: Written or spoken in the style of an epitaph.
meanings.sent1: The play had an epitaphian ending that left the audience in tears.
meanings.sent2: Her speech at the funeral was so epitaphian, it moved everyone present.
meanings.sent3: The epitaphian tone of his letter made his friend chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The epitaphian lyrics of the song resonated with the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The epitaphian poem painted a vivid picture of the deceased.
